stdlib/01_filter_urlencode_urldecode.html

Example on how to use urlencode, urldecode filters.

{# var = "http://example.com" #}

{{ var|urlencode }}           {# => http%3A%2F%2Fexample.com #}
{{ var|urlencode|urldecode }} {# => http://example.com #}
